title: I am Permanently banned when im not
body: I left one game because i had to go out to eat with my family, and i got a 20 min ban which i understand i left but when the 20 mins went away i got another 20 mins so i just stopped playing and now a year or 2 later i want to play but it is doing the same thing and i dont know what to do to get rid of it, and i dont want to create another account because i dont want to lose all my progress

replies.body:
*Wolfess* provided some great information here. If you're under a Leaverbuster low-priority queue, you'll see a number that shows how many times you have left before you've worked your way through them all. If you are marked as a "Leaver" or as "AFK" again while trying to work your way through these timers, you'll reset or lengthen their time even more. You can find our FAQ on this system [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.

In order for the low priority queue to be removed you have to wait the timer out, join a game, and finish it (Winning or losing doesn't matter as long as you just play the game through to the end)
Sometimes it's not just one queue you get low priority for, but several. It will let you know how many you have left after finishing a game I believe. If it makes it any easier, I believe games against the bots (Player VS AI) also counts in helping clear the low priority queue.

Hope this helps!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
